description: Guernsey's government has made the "sensible" decision to stop the visit as a precautionary measure.
title: Guernsey cancels cruise visit due to coronavirus
title_page: Guernsey cancels cruise visit due to coronavirus - BBC News
maintext: "We are taking great care in making decisions that may have an impact on local businesses, however whilst we are seeking advice on the handling of cruise ships from the appropriate agencies, we considered it sensible to cancel this first scheduled visit," Colin Le Ray, States of Guernsey Ports general manager, said.
